title: 7.17 patch
body: I haven't played in 4 weeks. I have ETA patch time of 400+ minutes and the downloaded is capped at 500kbps. Checked my internet speed, I have 80mbps down and 10mbps up. Any help?? This seems slightly ridiculous for something that's gonna be patched away in 2 days.

replies.body: I keep having the issue of Error Code 003 (something wrong with our servers), tried everything under the sun to try and fix it to no success. could use some advice on what to do

Your internet seems fine, but you can still have issues reaching another service like the patching server.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot any snags along the way.  You're also writing files down as well, so your hard drive could be playing a part especially if it's from an external source.

*UPDATE* Issue continued with login even after slow download. Have gone through every suggested thing by Riot still down. Help????
